name: Nano Project
description:
You are the member of special detachment for bio weapons elimination. The main character separated from detachment that after some time is taken unawares and dismantled. The main character alone tries to destroy bio weapons called Nano Project that improves all human abilities and makes him insensible to get the perfect strike force.

Game features:
  • Dynamic gameplay in oldschool style
  • Different arsenal and different types of enemies
  • Driving soundtrack
  • Graphics in the best traditions of 90s
